medical_history.chief_complaint: Progressive worsening of pruritic scalp nodules.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with scalp nodules that progressively worsened despite treatment with topical and intralesional steroids. The duration of symptoms was unspecified, but the follow-up showed regression of untreated areas within one week after embolization and excision.
medical_history.family_history: The patient's brother experienced similar chronic diarrhea and neurologic deterioration and had recently died. A cousin in his 40s was also affected, with no diagnosis established in either relative.
